overview: When Tex is brought in to fight in a range war between the cowmen and the nesters, he meets his old outlaw boss Lassiter. He learns Lassiter is behind the feud when Lassiter asks him to join up with his gang. Tex refuses and instead sets out to stop the feud but no one will believe him that Lassiter is responsible.
tagline: WAR IN THE WEST! Incited by a treacherous band of outlaws...threatening destruction of innocents lives!
title: The Feud Maker
